means: （圣餐礼中奉献面包和葡萄酒的）奉献仪式

sentence.Network_en: Money should be put in the offertory box.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 以o开头的英语英文单词 ... offer 提供；提出 n.提供 offertory 奉献仪式,捐款 official 官方的，正式的.

-ary, -ery, -ory：尔类而已_清抹侃英语_天涯博客 ... observatory 天文台,观象台 offertory 献金; 奉献 olfactory 嗅觉的, 味道的.
...5.震怒之日经(Dies lrae震怒之日)，6.奉献经(Offertory)，7.圣哉经(Sanctus)，8.慈悲耶稣(Pie Jesu Domine)，9.羔羊经(Agnus Dei)，…

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from ecclesiastical Latin offertorium 'offering', from late Latin offert- (which replaced Latin oblat-) 'offered', from the verb offerre (see offer)

means.word_mean: 1. the offerings of the congregation at a religious service
